en.loc: Yi-Reng Hall(Officeof Physical Education 操場
Yi-Reng Hall(Officeof Physical Education 操場

remark.ch: 限二三四年級未修過健康慢跑之學生與課號PE4411同班授課。研究生選修者請於人工加退選期間至體育室教學組辦理加簽。

goal.en: 1. Understand the correct running posture to achieve the concept of healthy running. 2. Increase the experience of different cardiorespiratory endurance training prescriptions to facilitate subsequent independent training. 3. Feel the atmosphere of multi-person group training to gain the pleasant experience of team training. 4. Establish a correct concept of running and exercise to promote physical and mental health. 5. Improve cardiorespiratory endurance performance.
goal.ch: 一、 瞭解跑步正確姿勢，以達到跑的健康之概念。 二、 增加不同心肺耐力訓練處方之經驗，以利後續自主強化。 三、 感受多人團練之氛圍，以獲得團隊訓練之愉悅經驗。 四、 建立正確跑步與運動之觀念，以促進身心健康。 五、 提升心肺耐力表現。

content.en:
1. (1) Description of class progress and precautions. (2) Introduce the
basic outline of long-distance running. (3) Protection against sports
injuries. (4) Explain the importance and operating experience of warm-up and cool-down exercises.
2. Body composition and physical fitness test (20-second repeated side steps, supine crunch, progressive endurance switchback run).
3. Understand cardiorespiratory fitness, understand running intensity
planning, basic running posture adjustment, 1600-meter running.
4. Runner's basic movements, hand waving training, fartlek training
experience (time change, speed change).
5. Runners' basic movements, establishment of exercise prescription
knowledge, and interval training experience (100m, 200m interval training).
6. Runner's basic movements, knowledge about sports nutrition,
experience of circuit training (muscle endurance training).
7. Basic movement of runners, application of sports psychology,
long-distance jogging (Long Slow Distance, LSD) training experience (40 minutes).
8. Runner's basic movement, agility/coordination training experience
(rope ladder, pyramid training).
9. Runner's basic movement, technical application of long-distance
running, team pursuit running training experience (30 minutes running).
10. Runner's basic movements, running-related upper limb muscle
strengthening (upper limb static and dynamic muscle strength).
11. Basic movement of runners, strengthening of running-related lower limb muscles (lower limb static and dynamic muscle strength).
12. Runner's basic movements and sprint speed training experience
(30m, 60m, 80m).
13. Runner's basic movement, campus road running experience
(30 minutes running).
14. Runner’s basic movements, core muscle training experience, and
running-related muscle stretching experience (single/double).
15. Body composition and physical fitness testing (20-second repeated side steps, supine crunch, progressive endurance switchback run).
16. Sports general knowledge test, 1600-meter run.
17. Make-up week.
18. Teachers can flexibly supplement teaching.
content.ch:
一. (1)上課進度及注意事項說明。(2)介紹長距離跑之基本概要。(3)運動傷害之防護。(4)說明暖身與緩和運動之重要性及操作體驗。
二.身體組成與體適能檢測（20秒反覆側步、仰臥捲腹、漸速耐力折返跑）。
三.瞭解心肺適能、瞭解跑步強度擬定、跑步基礎姿勢調整、1600公尺跑。
四.跑者基本動作、擺手訓練、法特雷克訓練體驗（時間變換、速度變換）。
五.跑者基本動作、運動處方知識建立、間歇訓練體驗（100m、200m間歇訓練）。
六.跑者基本動作、運動營養相關知識、循環訓練體驗（肌耐力之訓練）。
七.跑者基本動作、運動心理學應用、長距離慢跑 (Long Slow Distance, LSD) 訓練體驗（40分鐘）。
八.跑者基本動作、敏捷/協調訓練體驗（繩梯、角錐訓練）。
九.跑者基本動作、長距離跑之技術應用、團隊追逐跑訓練體驗（30分鐘跑）。
十.跑者基本動作、跑步相關上肢肌群強化（上肢靜態與動態肌力）。
十一.跑者基本動作、跑步相關下肢肌群強化（下肢靜態與動態肌力）。
十二.跑者基本動作、衝刺速度訓練體驗（30m、60m、80m）。
十三.跑者基本動作、校園路跑體驗（30分鐘跑）。
十四.跑者基本動作、核心肌群訓練體驗、跑步相關肌群伸展體驗（單人/雙人）。
十五.身體組成與體適能檢測（20秒反覆側步、仰臥捲腹、漸速耐力折返跑）。
十六.體育常識測驗、1600公尺跑。
十七.補考週。
十八.教師彈性補充教學。

textbook.en: 1.Fang, J. L., Cai, X. H., Lin, J. L., Huang, G. C., Xie, J. C., Zhuo, J. C., Zhuo, J. L., Liu, Y. M., Huang, Y. J., and Wu, J. L. (2021). Theory and practice of health related physical fitness. Wagner Enterprises. 2.Jin, Z. Y. (2018). The science of running training. Shimao Press.
textbook.ch: 1.方進隆、蔡秀華、林晉利、黃谷臣、謝錦城、卓俊辰、卓俊伶、劉影梅、黃永任、巫錦霖 (2021)。健康體適能：理論與實務（四版新修訂版）。華格那企業。 2.金哲彥 (2018)。跑步訓練的科學。世茂出版社。

method.ch: 講授 個別指導 其他

grading.en: 1. Physical education general knowledge test: 20% 2. Attendance rate and learning attitude: 20% 3. Skills test: 60%
grading.ch: 一、體育學科測驗：20% 二、出席率及學習態度：20% 三、術科測驗：60%

flex_desc.en:
17. Make-up week.
18. Teachers can flexibly supplement teaching.

十七.補考週。
十八.教師彈性補充教學。
